title: Chocolate cinnamon cake with damson cream filling

ingredients.item: 4 Duchy Originals From Waitrose Organic British Free Range Medium Eggs
50 g Green & Black’s Organic Cocoa Powder
½ x 265g jar Duchy Originals From Waitrose Organic Damson Preserve

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 180C, gas mark 4. Place the butter, sugar and eggs together in a large mixing bowl. sift in the flour, baking powder, cocoa and cinnamon and beat until thoroughly mixed. Spoon into 2 greased and base-lined round 20cm sandwich tins and levels the surface.  Bake for 30 minutes until well risen and a metal skewer emerges clean from the centre of the cakes. Turn out and cool on wire racks.  Sandwich the 2 cakes together with the damson jam and whipped cream and dust with cocoa.
